message: People only voluntarily kill themselves in two ways: cigarettes and love.
Petals fall, but the soul dances on...
Words aren't necessary to show love.
I was saving the world, and you saved me from it.
When everything you love dies, the world will plunge into darkness. But true love is stronger than death itself.
Hearts are my favorite treasures to steal.
Glad we met. Now I can finally get to the main course.
I used to run from love, but I was lucky enough to find you!
Whatever misfortune has befallen you, Christmas will make it brighter.
Enemies are all around, but you are the reason my heart beats.
Together, we'll uncover the truth.
Rules are made to be broken.
You're bittersweet like wild honey.
There are no winners in a dispute between loved ones.
I'm willing to wait for you for an eternity.
Are you ready to forget reality and dive into sin?
The best gifts are the ones that make memories!
A precious gift for the precious light you bring to my days.
I'm the one responsible for your holiday sins.
Why'd it have to be ducks?
No one can resist Doran Basu's blade. Not even you!
It doesn't matter how you decorate the tree, what matters is the holiday spirit in your heart.
May all your dreams come true tonight.
Gifts are for the nice, and wolves' teeth are for the naughty.
The unsung hero of every great feast.
Call for toads when there aren't enough elves!
Together for every Christmas and the rest of our lives.
He can handle anything except for you.
Love is worth fighting for, even if you have to get in the ring.
You're the most precious treasure in this library.
We're connected now... I have to admit, I'm happy about it.
What could be more seductive than a dominant woman?
I'll become your sweetest temptation.
Why don't we go for a ride?
You're the poetry of love.
Kings, your time is up. Queens reign now!
Let the whole world wait.
I may teach you bad things, but only if you ask me.

book: And the Haze Will Take Us
message: I can use these hands for more than just splitting logs.
If you don't give me my clothes back, I'll leave like this.
Are you ready to be seduced by my rhythm?
You're a threat to the pieces on my board... and to my heart.
I trus-st you with my s-secrets.
Next stop: love.
Love is the color in our lives that gives meaning to everything.
I'll do what you want, but you must pose as I say.
I bite, but not too hard: you might like it.
People's souls are reflected in each other like mirrors.
Looks like we'll need a lot of coffee tonight.
Stay vigilant even if the other person in the room is dead.
A wave is not an obstacle, it's a challenge.
Life is a battle. The reward is a moment of beauty—you.
Evil never rests, but I'll always be a step ahead.
It's hard to keep cool with such persistent interlocutors.
Empaths know how to negotiate.
A moment of rest—then back to saving more lives.
It's my duty to capture the moments the world mustn't forget.
Where death lurks, I will fight for life.
As long as I'm alive, this city won't fall.
The storm rages, but I hear only the sweetness of your voice.
They say the epistates has a special instinct for shesmu...
The reports of my death are greatly exaggerated.
What a pickle! The radiator is dead.
Looks like someone's about to get shocked
Smile, Shepha, for God's sake!
Ah, the world would be simply splendid if only it bowed to me!
Admit it, you're onyl frightened of me because you're attracted to evil.
A sacrifice's scream on the altar is the song for the Dark Mother.
You are my servants until the end of time!
I live in the darkness of Saintfour, and I will rise from it!
The Dark Mother would never abandon her child... She has come for you.
Let me invite you to my ball. The previous guests have grown weary.
Taste the poisonous flower and reveal your true face like I once had to!
I'm truly sorry. But executions are inevitable.
The one rejected by the light has to step into the darkness.
Follow the Tarot cards, and you'll find the way out!
The jaws of hell have opened, and now I'll do the talking.
Let's be soulmates... where you nourish me with your soul.
Humans are simply food. The Moon decided so.

book: And the Haze Will Take Us
message: I wished for you.

book: And the Haze Will Take Us
message: I'll curse the whole world for you.
An instant injection of romantic dependency, for which there is no antidote.
The world quiets when I'm where I belong, with my cat by my side.
Through the noise of concertss and the whirlwind of speed, I burst into your heart.
Don't worry, I'm here for you... but you worried me sick, trouble!
Don't think about tomorrow, just step into the depths where the water lilies bloom.
You carry the dreams I can only trace in ink.
Where the ice ends, love begins.
Sweet like raspberries, deadly like a poison.
Access code is love.
I get butterflies when I'm beside you.
One can tame, but I choose to care and love.
What hurts the most is what keeps you alive.
Centuries of solitude will burn in the bright moments of our meeting.
Hearts and souls are untouched by distance.
I'd give my gift, my magic, for just one dance with you.
How about a little mischief? I promise—it's all pretend.
Every granted wish has its price... but I'll never speak of yours.
To dare to love is to dare to live. Even if life itself is the price.
Death isn't enough to set things right.
True aristocrats never shy away from an adventure.
If light and darkness are inseparable, then I'll become the darkness so you can have the light.
Fearlessness, honor, and devotion—these are the key ingredients of magic.
Dad's kind, angry eyes
You're the worst witch, and I'm the best companion. We make a perfect duo, don't we?
Foxy, give me your paw. Or I'll eat all the noodles myself!
You called the wrong lawyer.
Let the music speak of my feelings for you.
I take what I want. And who I want.
Demons were never meant to walk this world.
The job can be a challenge, but we always find peace in a good story.
Stay with me, so we can rule the Duat together.
I will pray for the safety of the most precious thing in my life—you, my light.
Why is my coffee the best in Louisiana? Because it's made with love.
No need to pity me, because I won't pity anyone.
It's easier with monsters. You know what to expect from them.

book: And the Haze Will Take Us
message: The priest knows neither mercy nor remorse.

book: And the Haze Will Take Us
message: The priest knows neither mercy nor remorse.
The end of the world can wait.
Your pride is charming.
Whenever you call, I'll be there.
Every stitch holds thoughts of you.
The pain is as sweet as the pleasure
Duty may shackle the hands, but it holds no sway over the heart.
I am of darkness, but not bound to serve it.
Power lies not in strength, but in intellect and charisma.
You can only dream of being on my makeup level.
Just don't go too crazy over me when I win.
The fruit of forbidden love will become the continuation of our story.
Two hands are great, but two hands and four paws are even better!
Heaven is wherever we are together.
Sometimes I feel like wrapping my arms around him... and strangling him just a little.
They worship me... They fear me, but they want me.
True beauty is eternal.
Let's talk about your conduct.
So, why does the Vicar indeed suck?
I've been harsh, I know, but here I am, stripped of everything before you. Do you believe me?
Freedom is to fall and rise again. And I have found it here.
Hush, boy... I will take away your pain.

cardName: The curse of the sea dragon
message: I was a beast for so long that I forgot how to be human.
I won't let anyone hurt those I love!
This world is so beautiful! So why does everyone tell me about its ugliness?
If they take you away from me too, what will be left?
Where are your mocking grins now?
To kill or to pardon, that is the question...
I'm here to show you where the game ends and responsibility begins!
Do you hate me? So be it... but there's only one step from hate to love.
The night is cold, Lady. Sit closer, warm yourself.
You have the right to handcuff me. Anything you say can and will be used for your pleasure.
I wait for you to open my heart
Did you think you could hide from me, little shesmu?
I'm here, kalbi, and you're the only one I'm willing to make breakfast for.
It's a bit cramped for two here, which means we're abbout to get to know each other better.
Bad girls get bad boys.
Your favorite dessert is served, Precious Miss.

book: And the Haze Will Take Us
message: I will save you from evil just as you saved me from loneliness.
Today, I'll be your private flight attendant.
Baby, let's tear this place apart!
Let's go fly! I'll show you what magic is!
Pretend to be scared, otherwise the guys behind you will be upset.
What are you staring at? Never seen an angel before?
The things I have to do for this girl...
Come in, don't be afraid. I'm a harmless little lamb, see?
The portrait wasn't that good anyway.
Are the guests bored? Spin the wheel! The losers have never complained.
Lollipops and apples for everyone today! If you're late, I bite.
Here, treats and tricksters dance together.
There's about to be one more corpse.
First the candy, then the humans. That's how the Earth gets taken over.
Vampires pretending to be humans, pretending to be vampires... how avant-garde!
How about a ride, baby?
What are you staring at? The pants and shoes need to come off too.
What are you staring at? The pants and shoes need to come off too.
Look what an appreciative audience I've got, mein Schatz!
These blossoms are spicy and sweet, just like you. Such memories we have made together, out in the meadows...
One look from you is all it takes for me to cross the line.
My heart belongs to magic. And magic is you.
It's not just evil hunting us; we're hunting it too.
It's not just evil hunting us; we're hunting it too.
Hey, are you asleep? Come out, I came to see you.
I know how to put on a show. But the real magic starts when I'm only looking at you.
